item.name: Create Persistency by Basisgegevensset Zorg Capability Statement

exec: "description":"This CapabilityStatement describes the minimal requirements for a server to expose the \"Basisgegevensset Zorg\" (Dutch Patient Summary).",

item.name: Upload MedMiJ Custom Data (to be more complete)

body.raw:
library HelloWorld version '1' 
using QUICK 

valueset "weight": 'weight' 

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[@2013-01-01,@2014-01-01 )
context Patient 

define MaleBelow100:  
Patient.gender='female' and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 100

define GetWeight:  
[Observation: "weight"] O return Tuple{pid:Patient.id,gender:Patient.gender,city:Patient.address.city}

library SmallAndHeavy version '1' 
 
using QUICK
 
valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex' 
valueset "Vitamin D Deficiency" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/vitamin-d-deficiency' 
valueset "height" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/height' 
valueset "weight" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/weight' 
 
parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[@2013-01-01,@2014-01-01 ) 
 
context Patient 
 
define InDemographic: 
	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
 and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 80 
 and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex" 
	 
define isSmall: 
 exists([Observation: "height"] H where H.valueQuantity <= 160 'cm') 

define isSmallAndHeavy: 
 exists([Observation: "height"] H where H.valueQuantity <= 160 'cm') 
and exists([Observation: "weight"] W where W.valueQuantity >= 70 'kg') 
 
define isSmallAndHeavyAndInDemographic: 
isSmallAndHeavy and InDemographic
 

context Population
define countSmall:
  Count(isSmall)
define countInDemographic:
  Count(InDemographic)
define countIsSmallAndHeavyAndInDemographic:
  Count(isSmallAndHeavyAndInDemographic)
define ratioOfSmallAndHeavePeople:
  Count(isSmallAndHeavyAndInDemographic)/Count(InDemographic)
